Projects.title: Matinee | OTT Platform
Projects.about:
Designed and developed a web-app that demonstrates algorithms that a web-streaming app (like Netflix) or an audio-streaming app (like Spotify) may use for their Recommendation Engine.

Programmed the most efficient sorting algorithm for content based recommendation engine.
